article_title: CPA supported; open burning restrictions rejected
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: The Finance Committee supported the Community Preservation Act but rejected an article to restrict open burning in town.The committee went over all 41 articles on the Town Meeting warrant, along with the four articles on the special Town Meeting warrant, during two meetings last week.Town Meeting will be held on Monday, May 16, at 7:30 p.m. at the Danvers High School auditorium.(For information about Article 9 on moving the train depot to Hobart Street parking lot, see related story on
article_metadata.author: Jeff Pope
